api_token.title: API Token
api_token.description: To access models on Instill Cloud, enter your Instill Cloud API Token. You can find your tokens by visiting your Instill Cloud's Settings > API Tokens page. Leave this field empty to access models on your local Instill Model.

server_url.title: Server URL
server_url.description: Base URL for the Instill Model API. To access models on Instill Cloud, use the base URL `https://api.instill.tech`. To access models on your local Instill Model, use the base URL `http://api-gateway:8080`.

model_namespace.title: Model Namespace
model_namespace.description: Namespace of the Instill Model model to be used.

model_id.title: Model Id
model_id.description: ID of the Instill Model model to be used.

objects.description: A list of detected instance bounding boxes.

rle.description: Run Length Encoding (RLE) of instance mask within the bounding box.

boundingBox.description: The detected bounding box in (left, top, width, height) format.

category.description: The predicted category of the bounding box.

score.description: The confidence score of the predicted instance object.

model_id.description: ID of the Instill Model model to be used.

objects.description: A list of keypoint objects, a keypoint object includes all the pre-defined keypoints of a detected object.

keypoints.description: A keypoint group is composed of a list of pre-defined keypoints of a detected object.

score.description: The confidence score of the predicted object.

bounding_box.description: The detected bounding box in (left, top, width, height) format.

category.description: The predicted category of the bounding box.

score.description: The confidence score of the predicted category of the bounding box.
